sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYGROUPDESC FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP01, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%')
ORDER BY PrptyGroupName ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP01
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%')
